title: Christian James Hand
description:
Christian James Hand will make you appreciate music like you never have before. On his radio shows or live shows (and now Instagram show) he separates a famous song into each of its individual pieces and shows you why they each matter so much. Not only that, he has stories about that bad, or that guitar, or that day, that give you a more comprehensive understanding of what music is and why it's so special. 

 

https://www.thesessiononair.com

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
